summary.title: Where the Water Goes
summary.tagLine: Round and round and down and down
summary.about: What happens when someone pulls the plug?

chapters.heading: The Bath
chapters.prose: You are enjoying a warm bath at the end of a long day.  After a while, you feel a suggestion of a tug and don't think much of it.  Soon you are certain that you are headed for the drain.

chapters.heading: The Struggle
chapters.prose: You turn tail and start swimming away from the force.

signpost.teaser: Head for the toy and hope for the best.
Close your eyes and await your fate.
Give up and swim with the current.  Might as well get it over with.
